title: Why is Vayne at such a high pickrate?
body: She's one of the hardest ADCs in the game to play. I guess she's sorta favored in this meta with dive comps, but still most Vayne's are straight garbage if they haven't put hours into her kit.

replies.body:
What's difficult about her? 

You can tumble in any direction that's away from the enemy diving you and you also get stealth with it, you have the tumble and knockback to make kiting more forgiving if you mess up too. 

Condemning people into walls can be tough to pull off but what else is hard about her exactly? Her weak early game? You can play her top lane vs a ton of melees and stomp them in lane too

Vayne was never a difficult champion to play, only thing hard about her is condemning people into walls

> [{quoted}](name=FalconPawwwwnch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tifRkhwH,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2014-12-31T22:11:36.331+0000)
>
> What's difficult about her? 
> 
> You can tumble in any direction that's away from the enemy diving you and you also get stealth with it, you have the tumble and knockback to make kiting more forgiving if you mess up too. 
> 
> Condemning people into walls can be tough to pull off but what else is hard about her exactly? Her weak early game? You can play her top lane vs a ton of melees and stomp them in lane too
> 
> Vayne was never a difficult champion to play, only thing hard about her is condemning people into walls

Not difficult to play, difficult to play well.
maybe she is fun to play ?

> [{quoted}](name=Hagane No Arashi,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tifRkhwH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-31T21:25:04.862+0000)
>
> maybe she is fun to play ?

She is fun to play I can agree with that, but it seems better picks Lucian/Graves/MF are more viable right now.

Yeah those ones are a lot better than her right now.

Though you will still see a lot of Vayne this week especially with it being VAYNE FREE WEEK :/ so there will be a lot of bad Vaynes rolling around (which is why I've been using Teambuilder and look for teams WITHOUT a VAYNE lol)

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tifRkhwH,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-31T21:43:54.118+0000)

And where did you get this?

> [{quoted}](name=SeargentAnus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tifRkhwH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-31T21:27:58.060+0000)
>
> She is fun to play I can agree with that, but it seems better picks Lucian/Graves/MF are more viable right now.

You mean Jinx. Highest winrate of all marksmen, third highest play rate.
It's at the end of the season. Why not try to master Vayne?
Because all she needs is a little lead and she can kill anyone
BECAUSE MOST COMMUNITY IS TOXIC THAT MEAN MOST CANCER VAYNE MAINS ARE TOXIC
Perhaps people foreseeing a shift in the meta and trying to master Vayne in the hopes of getting ahead of the curb.
Probably more people beginning to try her in other roles
